Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT column_name FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.columns WHERE table_name = 'w2_Coupon' AND column_name = 'disp_flg') ALTER TABLE dbo.w2_Coupon ADD [disp_flg] [nvarchar](1) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N'0') GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT column_name FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.columns WHERE table_name = 'w2_Coupon' AND column_name = 'coupon_disp_discription') ALTER TABLE dbo.w2_Coupon ADD [coupon_disp_discription] [nvarchar](max) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N'') GO
